news.title: Iran's Revolutionary Guards chief killed by Israel
news.summary: Just last month, Salami had warned that Tehran would "open the gates of hell" if attacked by Israel or the US.

news.title: Israel has inflicted unprecedented damage on Iran's elite - why now?
news.summary: Benjamin Netanyahu has been making the argument that Israel faces existential threat if Iran gets a nuclear bomb for many years.

news.title: Watch: Footage shows explosions and buildings ablaze in Tehran
news.summary: Israel says it has carried out strikes on Iran's nuclear programme, with blasts and fires seen in Tehran and elsewhere.

news.title: What we know about Israel's attacks on Iran
news.summary: Senior military figures and nuclear scientists were among those killed, Iranian state media reported.

news.title: Grooming gang guilty of raping and abusing girls
news.summary: Seven men are convicted of sex offences against two girls in Rochdale between 2001 and 2006.

news.title: Student missed Air India flight by minutes after being stuck in traffic
news.summary: Bhoomi Chauhan was running late and airline staff wouldn't let her board Air India flight 171.

news.title: 'I walked out of rubble': British survivor on how he escaped wreckage
news.summary: Mr Ramesh said he saw cabin crew members and passengers dying in front of his eyes.

news.title: 'My kids are the reason I'm alive': Backstage with Shakira
news.summary: Shakira says the situation facing immigrants in the US is "painful" as she talks to the BBC in Miami.

news.title: World-first blood cancer therapy to be given on NHS
news.summary: It sneaks toxic drugs inside cancer cells to hit them hard while minimising side-effects.

news.title: Private schools lose High Court challenge over VAT changes
news.summary: Three high court judges have rejected a judicial review into the government's VAT policy on school fees.
